location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir Evan Nepean, Baronet, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Lord Mintohas arrived at Bushire, and that the weapons for the use of the King of Persia, Fatâ€²h Ali Shah Qajar, have been unloaded. It further notes that the HC Cruizer Benareshas been dispatched to Bussora [Basra] in order to convey intelligence back to India.
